Clip.Title: TULLA, THE SINGING WELL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Horn of Africa, when the drought comes each year, the Borana herders gather with their livestock around their wells, singing work songs that create a working rhythm. See their unique water management system through the season.

Clip.Title: WATER HEROES: AN INDIAN WATER STORY
Clip.Episode: WATER HEROES: AN INDIAN WATER STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: India suffers a great water crisis in many of its regions. See how two water crusaders have made significant difference in the lives of the villagers in these regions by their simple water conservation techniques.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey along Nova Scotia's Bay of Fundy coastline is a cultural and geological marvel - from historic Acadian Villages, to world-famous stone formations - rising from the sea.

Clip.Title: DESIGN BY DECADE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Dynamic. Original. Audacious. These are just some of the words that describe Canadian design during the 1980's. As Postmodernism infiltrated the design realm, objects became more decorative and often more daring.

Clip.Title: CITY GUIDES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow our City Guide as she takes us around the largest preserved Victorian neighbourhood in North America.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: BC's Northern, Coastal Boundary is an epic, high-altitude journey, from Seven Sisters Provincial Park, to Salmon Glacier, and the mountains of the Yellowhead highway.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Treviso to Montagnana, take a tour between water and land: from the charming canals of the Venice Lagoon to the artistic and cultural city of Padua.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Lake Garda to the Belluno Dolomites we continue our journey along the Brenta river with its amazing Palladio's villas and Verona with its Arena, where Shakespeare located the most famous love story ever, Romeo and Juliet.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: We take it for granted here on Earth, but it's in short supply in the rest of the solar system, at least in liquid form. The search for water is actually the search for life, and that search is taking us to some unusual places, including a moon of Saturn that is shooting liquid water into space.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Gravity sucks but where would we be with out it. Scientists are now probing to detect gravity waves in space. They are also mapping the gravity patterns of the moon for the first time.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.
